page.title: 15PRIEST FURNACES
page.content: {Priest Furnaces}was founded in{1919. Their business involves making {furnaces}for different companies.They have designed and constructed projects all over the world eg.Canada, Australia, New Zealand, U.S.A. and India. They{design}and{construct}all types of{reheating furnaces}for the ferice(which is steel)and non ferice (which is aluminium), and melting furnaces(which is copper). They have {draughtsmen}and{engineers}experienced in all disciplines including {mechanical, structural, hydraulic, {pneumatic, pipework,heat transfer and {fuels}with computer aided back up. Priest's provide a complete design, drawing{installation}and{maintenance service. The drawing office is a newly constructed building designed to modern draughting standards.
